title: Reputation Clean-Up Site Profits Off Smear Campaigns (Audio)
itunes:title: Reputation Clean-Up Site Profits Off Smear Campaigns (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Dune Lawrence, a reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses ripoffreport.com, which charges business to clean up online damage, which is often caused by the sites users. She speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
